Producer: Kimio Kataoka, Hikaru Kawase, Kenta Fukasaku, Masumi Okada
Production Co: Nippon Shuppan Hanbai (Nippan) K.K., Toho Company, Sega, Tokyo FM Broadcasting Co., Battle Royale Prod. Committee, TV Asahi, Toei Co. Ltd., Fukasaku-gumi, WOWOW, GAGA
Synopsis: Teenagers are shackled together in pairs and sent on a violent mission to kill a terrorist leader (Tatsuya Fujiwara) and his followers.
Title: Battle Royale II: Requiem
